item.title: How do you change the name of the npcs that are the shops
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

joeyven:

okay, i have changed the names and everything and ran the client with the client file, the names have been changed but the client names on the website browser game play remain the same anyway to fix this?

The Webclient is a jar with all the classes you’ve updated before. Now after updating you should re-jar you client then upload it the same way you did with the webclient.

Read full topic

item.title: How do you change the name of the npcs that are the shops
item.dc:creator: @MrFun MrFun
item.description:
@MrFun wrote:

[quote=“Lordabyssal, post:5, topic:537241”]Yes, this would be client sided look for your npc id in class8.java if not renamed. If renamed then look for entityDef.java.

Find aggroth and change it to whatever you want.

Would look something like: (If renamed)

non-renamed I think would look like

If he wants to change the npc name then we need to know if he has class5.java in the client side

Read full topic
